# The `basic_file_status` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents the result of a call to directory&#95;iterator::status(). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Represents the result of a call to directory&#95;iterator::status().

This is a subset of the information returned by a regular <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5f126cc7b64d31cd709215b48656d83d">sys::fs::status()</a> call, and represents the information provided by Windows FileFirstFile/FindNextFile.

Definition at line 132 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h">FileSystem.h</a>.

### getLastAccessedTime() {#ab258586eab700df6cf494d52dc282e91}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TimePoint llvm::sys::fs::basic&#95;file&#95;status::getLastAccessedTime () const</>}>
The file access time as reported from the underlying file system.

Also see comments on <code><a href="#ae807b50b0b414d8a9195cdc0ee23b86a">getLastModificationTime()</a></code> related to the precision of the returned value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h">FileSystem.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLastModificationTime() {#ae807b50b0b414d8a9195cdc0ee23b86a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TimePoint llvm::sys::fs::basic&#95;file&#95;status::getLastModificationTime () const</>}>
The file modification time as reported from the underlying file system.

The returned value allows for nanosecond precision but the actual resolution is an implementation detail of the underlying file system. There is no guarantee for what kind of resolution you can expect, the resolution can differ across platforms and even across mountpoints on the same machine.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h/#l00195">195</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h">FileSystem.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
